item.content:encoded:
问题描述

最近为站点添加ConsentCookie Manually Loading 代码，原始代码如下：

<script type="text/plain" class='optanon-category-C0004' async src="https://pagead2.googlesyndication.com/pagead/js/adsbygoogle.js"></script>

需要手动加载上述Javascript脚本，并执行。

解决方案

动态添加依赖外部链接的Javascript脚本

el = document.createElement('script'); 
el.src = 'https://pagead2.googlesyndication.com/pagead/js/adsbygoogle.js'; 
el.async = true; el.type = 'text/javascript'; 
el.className = 'optanon-category-C0001'; 

el.onload = () => {console.log('The inline script has been loaded successfully');}
document.getElementsByTagName('body')[0].appendChild(el)

延伸问题

动态添加内部Javascript脚本

let el = document.createElement('script'); 

let inlineCode = `
    alert('The inline script has been loaded successfully');
`;

let inlineCodeNode = document.createTextNode(inlineCode);

el.appendChild(inlineCodeNode);

document.body.appendChild(el);

HTML页面如何动态添加Javascript代码最先出现在IT Tech。
